name: Walking Statue
condition_immunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius), passive Perception 10

actions.name: Smash
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

special_abilities.name: Bludgeoning Weakness
special_abilities.desc: When the statue takes more than 10 bludgeoning damage from one attack, it falls prone.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the statue is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

special_abilities.name: Spell-created
special_abilities.desc: The DC for dispel magic to destroy this creature is 19.
